turns.answer:
Mafias are all about the money. Money is the key to power. If you can manipulate the economy, they will pay you.

When you are an MAFIA, it is called a "concentration party."
turns.label: unknown

turns.answer: I was working a pizza place at 6:30 AM, on a Saturday afternoon. The pizza place was so busy that I could barely get to work. I was in the same place, but I was nowhere close to my boss.
